title: US politics: Nikki Haley to give GOP response to State of the Union â as it happened | US news | The Guardian
summary: governor nikki haley to give gop response to state of the union .
republicans attack obama gun control actions .
in tears , obama calls on gun owners to 'join with us '
obama calls for background checks on all gun sales .

text: that 's it for us for the day in politics .
thanks for reading and for all of your comments .

bernie sanders sought to rekindle the anger of the occupy wall street movement in a major policy speech in new york on tuesday that revealed how he would aim to dismantle much of the modern investment banking system within months of taking office , reports guardian washington bureau chief dan roberts : declaring that the business model of wall street is fraud , the democratic presidential hopeful also fleshed out longstanding promises to jail bank executives and introduce a sweeping new transaction tax on speculation .
greed , fraud , dishonesty and arrogance , these are the words that best describe the reality of wall street today , sanders told supporters in midtown manhattan .
to those on wall street who may be listening today , let me be very clear .
greed is not good .
in fact , the greed of wall street and corporate america is destroying the fabric of our nation .
hellfire and pitchforks burton/getty images sanders also called for a national usury law to regulate interest rates charges by lenders : the bible has a term for this practice .
it 's called usury .
and in the divine comedy , dante reserved a special place in the seventh circle of hell for those who charged people usurious interest rates , he said .
today , we do n't need the hellfire and the pitchforks , we do n't need the rivers of boiling blood , but we do need a national usury law .
jumbo wingã©d metaphor alert lauren selsky ( @ ljselsky ) .
@ marcorubio tells ft dodge crowd he was late to this event because hillary clinton 's plane was ahead of him on runway .

documents.title: governor nikki haley to give gop response to state of the union
text: after the president delivers his final state of the union address next tuesday , governor nikki haley will deliver the republican response , according to house speaker paul ryan .
the state-of-the-union-response slot commonly goes to an up-and-coming , or would-be-up-and-coming , star of the party .
that turned to be true for florida senator marco rubio , but not so much for louisiana governor bobby jindal .
the governor 's name recognition is sure to expand with this speech .
tens of millions of people watch the state of the union address ; 38m watched last year , and 62m tuned in for george w bush 's 2003 fairy tale about saddam hussein 's wmds .

the reply speech is sometimes thought to be a stepping stone to the presidency , and indeed that has been the case for three of the last seven presidents : gerald ford , george hw bush and bill clinton .
far more numerous , however , are the rising political talents who saw their stars fade after answering the call to rebut .
governor haley was in the news last summer for supporting efforts in her state to remove the confederate flag from the grounds of the south carolina state capitol .
she 's a popular governor a poll last november put her in-state approval at 56 % , versus only 28 % who disapproved .
the guardian 's sabrina siddiqui is at the jeb event .
sabrina siddiqui ( @ sabrinasiddiqui ) who would lead jeb 's response to substance abuse ?
`` i would unleash columba garnica bush , '' he says , citing his wife 's work in florida .
sabrina siddiqui ( @ sabrinasiddiqui ) jeb recalls meeting four people in one day on his 2nd trip to nh last year who lost loved ones to overdose : `` it hit me like a brick wall . ''

sabrina siddiqui ( @ sabrinasiddiqui ) as christie , carly and jeb talk substance abuse in nh , here 's my story on the issue gaining prominence in 2016 also : sabrina siddiqui ( @ sabrinasiddiqui ) jeb asked by local reporter how obama 's executive orders on guns should be stopped .
`` in the courts , '' he says .
every politico knows that you never stick a candidate in a room that 's too big for the crowd .
so why did the bush team put jeb !
in this giant arena ?
tamara keith ( @ tamarakeithnpr ) .
@ jebbush says he 'll never forget daughter 's drug court graduation .
it is a serious problem he says of addiction .
on a serious note , bush 's speech today was on a topic of great personal pain : his daughter noelle 's struggles with drug abuse .
bush previewed the remarks in an online post titled addressing the heartbreak of addiction .
it begins : as a father , i have felt the heartbreak of drug abuse .
my daughter noelle suffered from addiction , and like many parents facing similar situations , her mom and i struggled to help .

bush continued : to win this fight across the country , i believe we need a multi-faceted strategy that : prevents drug abuse and addiction before it begins : drug abuse and addiction prevention efforts must start in childhood .
that begins with dedicated parents , strong communities and local education .

the private sector must also be committed to joining this fight to achieve success , including coalitions driven by local communities and involving health , local law enforcement and social services professionals .

when i was governor of florida , my wife columba took a very active role in prevention efforts with children ; treatment facilities focusing on women with children and struggling children ; and coordination of a resource network for local communities at the county level .
new jersey governor chris christie struck a chord in new hampshire in november with a call to offer addicts help instead of punishing them as criminals .
( h/t @ twitterid )
florida senator marco rubio brings the mad in a new television spot that , according to the campaign , will begin airing in early states .
who 's he mad at ?
barack obama .
what 's he mad about ?
barack obama making us unsafe .
america needs a real commander in chief , and a president who will keep us safe , rubio says .
it looks like he borrowed the oval office to shoot the spot , which seems generous of the white house .
rubio is usually sunnier than this .
in debates he follows the reagan principle of projecting optimism .
but that 's in contrast with donald this country is going to hell trump and trump 's shown that darkness sells .
the ad is called safe : ( h/t @ twitterid )
aaaaahhhhh ! ! !
bradd jaffy ( @ braddjaffy ) a+ reuters photo from trump 's rally yesterday in lowell , massachusetts aaaaahhhhh ! ! !
reading the pictures ( @ readingthepix ) trump & `` the scream .
the ( visual ) backlash begins ?
# landonnordeman for @ twitterid aaaaahhhhh ! !

according to her , donald trump used to send little messages to fox news host megyn kelly , whom he now regularly belittles and insults and who , he said , asked him all sorts of ridiculous questions at a debate and you know you could see there was blood coming out of her eyes , blood coming out of her wherever .
from a vanity fair interview : in the past , she says , he would send me press clippings about me that he would just sign donald trump . '
and he called from time to time to compliment a segment .
i did n't know why he was doing that .
and then when he announced that he was running for president , it became more clear .
but i ca n't be wooed .
i was never going to love him , and i was never going to hate him .
aaron blake ( @ aaronblakewp ) megyn kelly in vanity fair : donald trump used to be a fan ( a big one )
the white house has released a transcript of the president 's speech on guns .
a key passage : how did we get here ?
how did we get to the place where people think requiring a comprehensive background check means taking away people 's guns ?

each time this comes up , we are fed the excuse that common-sense reforms like background checks might not have stopped the last massacre , or the one before that , or the one before that , so why bother trying .
i reject that thinking .
( applause . )
we know we ca n't stop every act of violence , every act of evil in the world .
but maybe we could try to stop one act of evil , one act of violence .

the top republican in the iowa senate ( there are 24 republicans out of 50 state senators total ) endorses ted cruz for president : michael kelly ( @ isaiahsvision ) iowa state senator jerry behn endorses ted cruz for president
how difficult is it to pass a background check ?
most people who are checked pass .
but that does n't account for people who would not pass and choose to shop for guns in ways that avoid checks .
philip bump ( @ pbump ) worth noting in light of today 's announcement : only 0.56 percent of background checks are denied .

documents.title: republicans attack obama gun control actions
text: here 's a sampling of gop reaction to the gun control measures : ted cruz ( @ tedcruz ) fight back against @ twitterid 's unconstitutional # 2a executive actions !
# comeandtakeit leader mcconnell ( @ senatemajldr ) in wake of @ twitterid ' vow to politicize shootings , hard to see today 's announcement as being about more than politics .
gov .
mike huckabee ( @ govmikehuckabee ) .
@ barackobama you say if we can save one life we should .
well , apply 5th & 14th amendments to the unborn & save 4,000 lives a day .
# prolife sam stein ( @ samsteinhp ) this morning conservatives were saying obama actions were a nothing burger .

this afternoon , the statements from elected rs are apocalyptical clinton praises obama move on guns hillary clinton ( @ hillaryclinton ) thank you , @ twitterid , for taking a crucial step forward on gun violence .
our next president has to build on that progressnot rip it away .
-h hillary clinton ( @ hillaryclinton ) .
@ potus is right : we can protect the second amendment while protecting our families and communities from gun violence .
and we have to .
the president has concluded his remarks on new executive actions on gun control .

here 's what we learned : in an emotional appearance , president obama announced that he was taking action to beef up background checks on gun sales , and to institute new legal penalties for illegal gun sales .
the president cried freely as he talked about the victims of the 2012 massacre at sandy hook elementary school .
every time i think about those kids it gets me mad , he said .
obama called for new gun safety measures to prevent children from dying in accidental shootings .
if a child ca n't open a bottle of aspirin , he said , we should make sure they ca n't pull the trigger on a gun .
30,000 americans die each year in gun violence , obama said : we do not have to accept this carnage as the price of freedom .
republicans decried the president 's move .
house speaker paul ryan accused obama of dismissiveness and senate majority leader mitch mcconnell said obama had made a vow to politicize shootings .
the new guidelines include measures to encourage states to swap information on those with mental illness .
for details of the proposal , read dan roberts here : obama 's gun control plan may be watered down , but it 's not flat read more barack obama wipes away tears while talking about gun control .
it was an unusually emotional address by obama , in which he allowed himself to cry freely .

that 's not unprecedented behind the presidential seal think of george w bush at the 2008 medal of honor ceremony but the president today let the tears flow , and let people see it invited people to see him crying .
here 's footage of the 2008 bush event :
the president wraps .
applause and done .
obama warns that putting in place a new gun culture will take time .
it wo n't happen overnight .
it wo n't happen during this congress .
it wo n't happen during my presidency .
but a lot of things do n't happen overnight .
then he draws a set of powerful analogies : the liberation of african-americans did n't happen overnight .
lgbt rights took decades worth of work .
so just that it 's hard is no excuse not to try .
and if you ever have any doubt about why you should feel the fierce urgency of now , think about what happened three years ago .
he tells the story of zaevion dobson , a high school sophomore who was shot dead in tennessee after throwing his body in front of a group of three girls under gunfire .
he gave his life to save theirs .
an act of heroism bigger than we should ever expect from a kid .

documents.title: in tears , obama calls on gun owners to 'join with us '
text: the president pauses , and begins to cry .
tears are tracking down both cheeks .
every time i think about those kids it gets me mad , he says , in reference to newtown .
and by the way , it happens in the streets of chicago every day .
he calls on gun owners who feel their rights are not being represented to join with us to demand something better .
the president continues his summary of the new executive actions .
he says the new measures will boost gun safety , specifically with an aim to stopping the accidental deaths by gun of children .
he says some smart phones wo n't operate unless you have the right fingerprint .
why ca n't we do the same thing for our guns ?
he asks .
if a child ca n't open a bottle of aspirin , we should make sure they ca n't pull a trigger on a gun , he says .
another applause line in a roomful of advocates .
the times flags a policy line about additional atf agents and funding for mental health treatment .

nyt politics ( @ nytpolitics ) obama says atf to add 200 more agents and investigators ; will invest $ 500 million in treatment for mental health more details on the 10-part executive order from the guardian 's washington bureau chief dan roberts right here : obama 's gun control plan may be watered down , but it 's not flat read more

obama says the new executive actions will require background checks for the vast majority of gun purchases online , in person at gun shows , out of the back of a down a dirt road in laredo with new legal penalties for sellers who do n't comply .
he describes additional restrictions on sales .
but he also describes measures that would not apply narrowly to the sale of firearms .
he says the government will study how to do more to help people who suffer from mental illness .
that 's why we made sure the affordable care act , also known as obamacare [ laughter in the room ] , made sure that treatment for mental health was treated the same as other illness .
correction : this post has been updated .
the executive actions are not written to require background checks in some minor gun sales , as previously , and incorrectly , reported .
obama is letting congress having it for sinking legislation that would have tied terror watch lists to gun purchases .
even after san bernardino , they refused to make it harder for terror suspects who came in on a plane to buy semiautomatic weapons .
that 's not right , that ca n't be right .
applause line : we do not have to accept this carnage as the price of freedom .
another one : congress still needs to act folks in this room will not rest until congress does .

here 's a handy guardian interactive on just how much your member of congress has done for gun control and how much money they 're getting from the nra : gun deaths in your district : what have your elected representatives done ?
read more
how did this become such a partisan issue ?
obama asks .
he points out that both former president george w bush and senator john mccain have supported what he is out to do today , close the gun show loophole .
most republican voters and even the nra have supported expanded background checks , he says .
then he lays into congress for failing to pass gun reform legislation .
how did this become such a partisan issue ?
kamm/afp/getty images

documents.title: obama calls for background checks on all gun sales
text: you pass a background check , you can buy a gun , obama says , in a pithy summary of his new executive actions .

then he takes a dig at florida senator marco rubio , among other presidential candidates , whom he does not name : contrary to the claims of some presidential candidates apparently before today 's meeting , this is not a plot to take away everyone 's arms .
npr ( @ npr ) .
@ marcorubio @ twitterid respond to executive actions on guns ( more on obama 's plans :
obama says i believe in the second amendment , but says he sees room for gun control measures under its umbrella of rights .
it 's there written on paper .
it guarantees the right to bear arms , obama says .
i taught constitutional law , i know a little bit about this , i get it .
but i also believe we can find ways to reduce gun violence that are consistent with the second amendment .
he draws an analogy with first-amendment guarantees of free speech but proscriptions against yelling fire ' in a crowded theater .

documents.title: obama : 'excuses no longer suffice '
text: the president continues : the constant excuses for inaction no longer do it .
no longer suffice .
and that is why we are here today .
not to lament the last mass shooting , but to try to prevent the next one .
obama says we do have to feel a sense of urgency about the gun violence problem in the us .
we are not inherently more prone to violence , but we are the only advanced country on earth that sees this kind of mass violence erupt with this kind of frequency .
it does n't happen in other advanced countries .
it 's not even close .
as i said , somehow we 've become numb to it , and we start thinking that this is normal .
and instead of thinking about how to solve the problem , this has become one of our most polarized partisan [ issues ] , despite a general consensus in america about what needs to be done .
the president pays tribute to giffords and her path to recovery .
i know the pain that she and her family have endured these past five years , and the rehabilitation and the work , and the effort to recover , obama says .
and then i think of all the americans who are n't as [ fortunate ] .
every year , obama says , 30,000 americans die in gun violence .
he notably mentions suicides in a list of ways guns take lives .
obama recalls meeting the newtown families after the massacre , and his hope at the time that a substantial gun reform law would be passed .
he lists mass shootings since us representative gabrielle giffords was shot in tucson , arizona in 2011 .
giffords and her husband , astronaut ( and twin ) mark kelly , are in the room .

among those standing behind the lectern in the east room is lucia mcbath , mother of jordan davis ( read more ) , an unarmed african american 17-year-old shot dead in a florida parking lot in 2012 by a middle-aged white man .
the president begins speaking .
the president is about to speak .
he 's being introduced by a father of a victim of the december 2012 massacre at sandy hook elementary school in newtown , connecticut .

welcome we 're about to watch president obama announce new executive actions on gun control that would tighten the so-called gun show loophole , which currently allows some in-person and lots of online sales to be conducted without background checks .
washington bureau chief dan roberts has taken a look : just how far is obama going on guns , really ?
dan 's also in the east room for us , and you can watch live online right here .
ahead of the announcement , republicans have accused the president of abuse of office , of power , the bill of rights , and of f-r-e-e-d-o-m .
but that 's not how the american public feels , as the president himself pointed out in an appearance monday with attorney general loretta lynch to preview the policy changes .
president obama ( @ potus ) the gun lobby may be holding congress hostage , but they ca n't hold america hostage .
we ca n't accept this carnage in our communities .
on a parallel track : politics !

dan roberts also is taking a look at bernie sanders ' campaign strategy , as the vermont senator continues to rack up seriously solid fundraising numbers ( $ 33m in q4 to hillary clinton 's $ 55m ) despite being written off as a contender by a nameless some .
he 'll be speaking on financial reform here in new york at 2pm eastern time , with some campaign hints before then .
and the guardian 's sabrina siddiqui is in new hampshire , where she will be subjecting herself to a double dose of jeb bush , live and in electrifying person .
read on !

Jeb Bush delivers personal speech on drug addiction.
Tearful Obama tightens gun control and tells Congress: We can't wait'
